desc: Hand Selected Unique and Stunning Crystals, gems, jewelry and crystal resources. Our shop contains crystals that Protect, Calm, Manifest, Heal, Create, Love, Intuition, Balance. We select and bring to you the best of Amethyst, Rose Quartz, Pink Amethyst, Clear Quartz, Blue Calcite and many other semi-precious stones.

layout.text: Check out our collections of healing gemstones, crystals and Jewelry.
